column5: This one bedroom apartment can also be booked along with another 2 bedroom listing ! Everything you need to be cost efficient on vacation with your family and friends ! 20 min from San Marcos outlets, 6 min from river and Schlitterbahn, 8 min from Gruene. Located in center of New Braunfels. If you need to have a late check in or late check out just let me know, I'm sure we can figure something out.
column8: Less than 3 miles from Schlitterbahn & River #411
